anathema: Provoke a fight, give mercy to anyone who provokes a fight with you
description: Diomazul is a minor Vudran war god represented as a serpent with many arms each holding a blade. He is known to be brutal in battle.
edicts: Remain celibate and detached from worldly pleasures, meditate, utterly destroy enemies, erase all traces of defeated foes
name: Diomazul
